strings.Value: [Attack] "I don't trade with goblins, I cut them down."

{n}As you approach, the goblin stands, grinning with wide, yellow teeth almost as sharp as his eyes are. You notice a large, dirty sack behind him, which you almost mistook for a second goblin.{/n} "Ah, an adventurer! Greet and well comes! I Chwurk, a buyer! I sell, I trade — whatever you, sword-swingers, need, I offer! Want to buy something? I can see it in your eyes, yes, you do! Just five money-pieces! Not got that much? Ten then! No? Twist my wrists I give discount — just half... half-hundred! So, have a deal? Deal, deal?" {n}He sticks out his palm, trying to shake your hand.{/n}

{n}The goblin's palm is covered in something sticky you can't identify — but can definitely feel crawling on your skin. Oblivious, he continues to shake your hand with enthusiasm — he's got an amazingly strong grip. {/n} "Great! We rich now! A deal of all time!" {n}He slowly stops shaking your hand, and you take the opportunity to unpeel yourself from his grip.{/n} "Wait.... hold on, what we dealing about now?"

"Everything you be needing for adventures, spell-casting, sword-swinging! Just look at yourself — who can you beat with metals and craftings like that? Only today, only for you — bestest weapons made by goblin bestest crafters! Just wait..."

{n}The goblin reaches into the sack by his side and produces... a stick with a rusty nail at the end. He swings it several times with a SWSSSSH, almost hitting his own ear. {/n}
"This one — can bring whole troll down! Take it, it not be many coins. Don't like it? Fine, I can sell you a hydra, if you like! It be a good hydra, all teeth and claws! Just a giant-house of money-pieces — and it yours!" {n}He puts on a grim expression, as if afraid of being cheated.{/n} "Delivery — cost you though!"

"Not good. One can't trade with them! They no money, not a single slivs shiny or copper circle — only teeth, rocks." {n}The goblin suddenly brightens.{/n} "Hey, what about you, you have money?" {n}Just as suddenly he narrows his eyes.{/n} "But maybe you try fool me? See wares, take wares, run? If so, I be seeing money first!"
"Aieee, hold on! No claws!" {n}Almost quicker than your eye can follow, the goblin snatches up the sack, dives under the nearest fence — and vanishes. {/n}
"How you be doing? Killed many beasties? Need wares? Ready make deal now with Chwurk? Say yes!" {n}The goblin thrusts out his palm, trying to shake your hand.{/n}
"And this, ladies and gentlemen, is precisely how most merchants in {g|Absalom}Absalom{/g} do business."
"Why even talk to these vermin? Just cut 'em up and forget about 'em."
